<template>

const fetchUserInfo = async() => {
      const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
      console.log(token);
      try {
        const resp =  await axios.get('/account/auth/',{
            headers: {
                'Authorization': `Bearer ${token}` // 设置请求头
                }});
        console.log('验证结果:')

        userName.value = resp.data.username;
        //has_brands.value = resp.data.created_brands.length;
        localStorage.setItem('username',resp.data.username);
          } catch (error) {

//直接将原文发往后台获得建议
const adviceResponse = ref('');
const showAdviceModalRef = ref(false);
const showAdviceModal = showAdviceModalRef;
const copyData = ref({});

//解析Markdown格式
const md = MarkdownIt();
const markdownAdviceResponse = computed(()=>{
    return md.render(adviceResponse.value)});
const adviceData=ref(null);
const getAdvices = async(message) => {
    adviceResponse.value='';
    adviceData.value = message;
    console.log(adviceData);
    copyData.value.original=message;
    const token = localStorage.getItem('token');
    console.log(token);
    showAdviceModal.value=true;
    await axios.post("/api/advice/",copyData.value,{
            headers:{
                'Authorization':`Bearer ${token}`,
                },
            withCredentials:true,
                }).then(resp => {
                   // 处理你后端返回的response
                   console.log(resp.data);
                   adviceResponse.value=resp.data;
                   //formatCampaignInfo();
                 }).catch(err => {
            console.log('Fail to get info:',err);
            });
    
    };

//跳转CampaignPage继续获取优化后的文案
const store = useStore();
const router = useRouter();

const toCampaignPage = ()=>{
    store.commit('set_temp_campaign_data',adviceData);
    router.push('/campaignPage');
    }
